reviews.customers_say: Customers love this sweater's style, particularly its vibrant colors and details at the neckline and cuffs, while appreciating its soft material and comfortable, non-itchy feel.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable, Comfy Sweater - Dry on Very Low Heat
items.body: This is a beautiful, comfortable sweater that’s slightly baggy with an adorable scallop neckline. I initially ordered both the ‘beige’ and the ‘apricot’ to see which color I liked better. I ended up sticking with the beige because it’s a nice neutral tan color, and because the apricot had subtle yellow undertones that didn’t look good with my skin tone. In the picture, the left is the beige and the right is the apricot. I like the slight oversize of this sweater - gives a comfy, loungy vibe than can be dressed up with jeans and cute ankle booties, or dressed down with leggings and slip-on’s. I tried both the small and medium sizes and I decided to stick with the medium because I wanted to stay with the more oversized look. The material is very soft and is good quality. It’s stretchy and has longer sleeves, which I like. While the washing instructions say not to machine dry it, I’ve found success in being able to put it in the dryer on a very low heat setting. My dryer has 5 heat settings and I’ve dried this sweater several times on a level 2 heat setting with my other clothes, like fleece-lined leggings, that I don’t want to dry too hot, and the sweater has been fine - no shrinking whatsoever. I’m very happy with this sweater! Read more
items.author: J.H.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Fall Staple - Vibrant Colors & Great Fit!
items.body: I am so impressed with this Zeagoo V-neck sweater! It is well worth the 5 stars. I was a bit nervous about the sizing, but it fits perfectly and is truly true to size. The colors are even more vibrant in person than they are in the photos—it really pops! ​I’ve already put it through the machine wash (I used a cold cycle), and it came out looking brand new without any pilling or fading. For the price, the quality is fantastic. It’s a great mid-weight sweater that feels more expensive than it is. Highly recommend for your 2025 fall wardrobe! Read more
items.author: G

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and great quality
items.body: Such a cute and great quality sweater. Thick, soft, fit to size! I will definitely get more in different colors. Read more
items.author: Jill

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Over all great sweater!
items.body: Love the look of this sweater on. It fits well and is pretty. the material is not scratchy.The picture shows a sweater that appears longer than what it actually is. it sits just below my waist. Perfect with dress pants not great with leggings! Read more
items.author: KLearn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this!
items.body: I couldn't love this sweater more. Its so cute. Its got a tight knit so its super smooth and so cute. Its soft, thick and warm. Its such a value for what it costs. You'd think it came from a high end store. The quality seems amazing. I know it says dont dry but I put it in the dryer for like 10 minutes just enough to get the wrinkles out then I hang dry. It came out beautiful. The green is like a dark army green but its not dull. Its so pretty. Its versatile. You could put it with jeans or dress it up. Read more
items.author: Olivia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bows and Beauty.
items.body: The sweater is nice and looks just like the photo. The color is a dark beige. The fit is a touch wide in the waist and fits nicely in the bust and isn’t too long in the length. The sweater isn’t itchy and I don’t have to wear a T-shirt underneath the sweater. Read more
items.author: just another student

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome if you’re looking for oversized!
items.body: This sweater was super cute, and also very over sized. I’m 5’4” 142lbs and a 32DDD. With a large chest, oversized tops make me look too heavy. The quality was great, super soft, but a small probably would’ve been big on me. I wanted to love it, but ended up returning to try a different more fitted style. Read more
items.author: Jessica J.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft, generous fit, pretty bow pattern
items.body: I ordered this bow sweater as I had been trying to find a similar one in stores in my size (2x) but to no avail. I was happy with the look of the sweater and its generous cut/fit. It’s a fairly heavy sweater so it’s best to wear in cold weather. I wish the stitching where the sleeves attached to the sweater and on the sides from under the arm to waist was in ivory. It’s actually in a black color. I really wish the sweater wasn’t assembled in pieces of fabric with the black stitches but rather one consistent piece of fabric. I’m keeping it as I really like the print and very soft fabric. I do recommend it. Read more
items.author: Shopping in NJ

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Z- Flowers Grey, Y- Khaki & Black, Apricot, Army Green, Y- Grey & Navy, Black, Z- Leopard Print, Z- Bow Black, Beige, Y- Grey & Pink, Z - Polka Dot, Grey, Z- Bow Burgundy. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
